system.description:
Class: @UUID[Compendium.projectfu.classes.eO37Jm8x3VaGmE7c]{Sharpshooter}

Qualities

  1. When you perform an Attack you may spend @LOSS[10 mp] in order to change its elemental type to one of the following: @WEAPON[fire] @WEAPON[ice] @WEAPON[bolt]

  2. You may use an action to gain @UUID[Compendium.fu-azure-compendia.effects.5qFbZynjbNXDkWrq]{Aiming}

  3. When you perform @UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.lCFQMCY4AmDsv6sv]{Barrage} and it hits all targets you gain @UUID[Compendium.fu-azure-compendia.effects.h4GrXhLMBi5NRYNJ]{Cover Fire}
